description: Triangle read by rows giving T(n,k) = number of inequivalent indecomposable linear [ n,k ] binary codes without 0 columns (n >= 2, 1 <= k <= n).
references: H. Fripertinger and A. Kerber, in AAECC-11, Lect. Notes Comp. Sci. 948 (1995), 194-204.
D. Slepian, Some further theory of group codes. Bell System Tech. J. 39 1960 1219-1252.
links: Index entries for sequences related to binary linear codes
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
